LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active_Policy__c.description: Specifies whether a promotion of this template is initially active or if a tactic of this type is initially pre-set as included in the promotion (not considered if the tactic is manually added to the promotion).

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Indicates whether the template is active.

cgcloud__Additional_Custom_Main_KPI_Subs.description: Used when Subset Load Optimization is enabled to specify subsets that are additionally loaded when opening a promotion.

cgcloud__Adjustment_KPI_1_Description__c.description: Stores the description of KPI Set KPI Definition.

cgcloud__Adjustment_KPI_1_Name__c.description: Currently not used in the layout. It will be referred by the UI team.

cgcloud__Adjustment_KPI_1__c.description: Reference to KPI Set KPI Definition of the attached KPI Set.

cgcloud__Adjustment_KPI_2_Description__c.description: Stores the description of KPI Set KPI Definition.

cgcloud__Adjustment_KPI_2_Name__c.description: Currently not used in the layout. It will be referred by the UI team.

cgcloud__Adjustment_KPI_2__c.description: Reference to KPI Set KPI Definition of the attached KPI Set.

cgcloud__Adjustment_KPI_3_Description__c.description: Stores the description of KPI Set KPI Definition.

cgcloud__Adjustment_KPI_3_Name__c.description: Currently not used in the layout. It will be referred by the UI team.

cgcloud__Adjustment_KPI_3__c.description: Reference to KPI Set KPI Definition of the attached KPI Set.

cgcloud__Anchor_Type__c.description: Specifies the anchor type of the promotion.

cgcloud__Auto_Close_On_Filter_Apply__c.description: Indicates whether the manage product modal window is closed automatically after applying the filters.

cgcloud__Available_Product_Level__c.description: Specifies whether the multiple set of values that a user can choose that will be further used for aggregation on the calculation grid for promotions.

cgcloud__BOM_Handler__c.description: Determines whether BOM products will be considered in promotions created using the template.

cgcloud__Calculation_Mode__c.description: Specifies the values of Calculation Mode for the promotion.

cgcloud__Consider_Account_Product_List__.description: Flag that indicates whether Account Product List is considered for Promotions.

cgcloud__Consider_Listing__c.description: Controls whether all products of active listings are considered when bringing back the products that are part of the promoted cluster or product group according to the specified listing finding template.

cgcloud__Consider_Product_KAM_Status__c.description: Specifies the promotion dates that are used to determine valid products based on KAM Status.

cgcloud__Consider_Promotion_Rewards__c.description: Specifies whether the promotion is considered for rewards.

cgcloud__Creation_Platform__c.description: Indicates the platform on which this template can be used to create new promotions.

cgcloud__Display_Fund_Card__c.description: Determines whether a fund card is enabled for promotions created by using this template.

cgcloud__Display_In_Visit__c.description: If at the call date the promotion is valid for the business partner of the call, the promotion is shown in a call.

cgcloud__Display_KPI_Validations_Only_On.description: Determines whether KPI validations are shown only on save while editing the promotion.

cgcloud__Display_SPC__c.description: Depending on the value of this checkbox, SPC is shown.

cgcloud__Displayed_Product_Level__c.description: Product levels that are shown in P&L Views (VPC/SPC).

cgcloud__Enable_Condition_Creation__c.description: Feature flag to enable the Tactic Condition Creation for promotions of this template. When enabled, conditions will be created for condition generating tactics.

cgcloud__Ignore_Time_When_Deleting_The_P.description: If a TPM promotion is associated with a promotion template where Ignore_Time_When_Deleting_The_Promotion is true, then the dates of the TPM promotion (and the transfer lead time or the followup time) arenâ€™t observed to determine if the promotion is relevant for the deletion process.

cgcloud__Is_Copyable__c.description: Flag that indicates whether a promotion template is copyable.

cgcloud__Is_Derivable__c.description: Indicates whether the Promotion Template can be used for a derive action.

cgcloud__Is_Pushable__c.description: Identifies whether the Promotion Template is pushable.

cgcloud__Is_Transfer_Relevant__c.description: Identifies and evaluates the promotion associated with the promotion template where Is Transfer Relevant is Yes for the promotion transfer process.

cgcloud__Mass_Copy_Start_Date__c.description: Controls how the dates of new promotions are determined when promotions are copied via the Mass Copy process.

cgcloud__Mobility_Color__c.description: Color that are used to show the promotion.

cgcloud__Number_Of_Copy_Usage_Hierarchie.description: Total number of Hierarchies under the Promotion Template with Copy Usage.

cgcloud__Number_Of_Derive_Usage_Hierarch.description: Total number of Hierarchies under the Promotion Template with Derive Usage.

cgcloud__Number_Of_Push_Usage_Hierarchie.description: Number of Child Templates in the Hierarchy with Usage as Push.

cgcloud__Product_Definition_Level__c.description: Specifies the level at which products are defined.

cgcloud__Product_Definition_Policy__c.description: For Dynamic policy, promotion products can be defined via a filter. Promotion products change according to the changes in the product master data. The result can change until the promotion is frozen (Promotion.Is_Frozen = 'True'). For Static policy, promotion products are explicitly defined. Changes in the product master data don't trigger a change of the promotion products.

cgcloud__Promo_Phases_Cleaning__c.description: Promotion phases in which promotion cleaning (scenarios, inactive tactics) happens. Depends on the Promotion_Phases global picklist.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org of the promotion template.

cgcloud__Selectable_Promotion__c.description: Specifies whether the promotion is auto-granted or selectable by selecting the corresponding checkbox.

cgcloud__Special_Order_Relevant__c.description: Flag indicates whether the Promotion is special order-relevant.

cgcloud__Sub_Accounts_Enabled__c.description: Defines whether the Sub Account Planning feature is enabled for the promotions with this template. This checkbox can only be enabled if Anchor Type is Customer.

cgcloud__Synchronize_Promotion_Timeframe.description: If this field is selected as TRUE, the Shipment Dates From and Thru and InStore From and Thru dates always have the values set in Date From and Date Thru.

cgcloud__TFD_Commit_Date_Offset__c.description: Offset that's used to calculate the value of Commit Date from Date From, if the Timeframe Determination Policy isn't Manual.

cgcloud__TFD_Delivery_Date_From_Offset__.description: Offset that's used to calculate the value of Shipment Date From from In-Store Date From, if the Timeframe Determination Policy isn't Manual.

cgcloud__TFD_Delivery_Date_Thru_Offset__.description: Offset that's used to calculate the value of Shipment Date Thru from n-Store Date Thru, if the Timeframe Determination Policy isn't Manual.

cgcloud__Timeframe_Determination_Policy_.description: Determines whether promotion dates are added by the user or automatically determined by the system from a given pair of In-Store dates.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Color__c.description: Specifies the color of the promotion in Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Relevant__c.description: Specifies whether the promotion is to be shown in Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Transfer_Relevant_Phases__c.description: Identifies the promotion phases for the transfer process. Only the promotions in the transfer-relevant phases are considered for transfer.

cgcloud__Transfer_Lead_Time__c.description: Defines the number of days in the past from the current date the promotion is eligible for transfer.

cgcloud__Transfer_Follow_Up_Time__c.description: Defines the number of days in the future from the current date the promotion is eligible for transfer.

cgcloud__UI_Contract__c.description: Contract that's associated with a template.

cgcloud__UI_Type__c.description: Specifies that the UI is displayed for a particular promotion type.

cgcloud__Use_UI_Contract__c.description: Flag that indicates whether UI contracts are switched off for promotions.

cgcloud__Used_Reference_Date__c.description: Defines the date that's to be used for the product hierarchy resolution if promotions of this type are calculated.
